cycle.description: To explain the pumping concept, suppose that there is an exactly one cycle in the DFA.
cycle.question: What can happened to that cycle?
answer: The cycle might be executed once
The cycle might be executed more than once
choices: The cycle might be executed once
The cycle might be executed more than once

once.description: Let us call the part captured by the DFA before the loop $w_1$, the part captured by loop $v$, and the part captured after the cycle $w_2$.
once.question: What is the form for string accepted by this DFA when the cycle is executed exactly once?

none.description: Let us call the part captured by the DFA before the loop $w_1$, the part captured by loop $v$, and the part captured after the cycle $w_2$.
none.question: What is the form for string accepted by this DFA when the cycle is skipped?

twice.description: Let us call the part captured by the DFA before the loop $w_1$, the part captured by loop $v$, and the part captured after the cycle $w_2$.
twice.question: What is the form for any string accepted by this DFA when the cycle is executed twice?

many.description: Let us call the part captured by the DFA before the loop $w_1$, the part captured by loop $v$, and the part captured after the cycle $w_2$.
